TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OutputAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class OutputAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class OutputAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定义任务作者用来标识从任务输出数据的任务属性的元数据特性。

span.span: Defines the metadata attribute that task authors use to identify task properties that output data from the task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 引擎只允许使用此属性标记的任务属性来输出任务的数据。The [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] engine will only allow task properties marked with this attribute to output data from a task. 项目作者只能在项目文件的 `Output` 元素中使用标记有此特性的属性。Project authors can only use properties marked with this attribute in the `Output` element of a project file. 所有其他任务属性被视为任务的输入。All other task properties are treated as inputs to a task. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[使用属性扩展元数据](/dotnet/standard/attributes/)。For more information about using attributes, see [Extending Metadata Using Attributes](/dotnet/standard/attributes/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示用于创建一个或多个目录的任务的代码。The following example shows the code for a task that creates one or more directories. [!code-csharp[msbuild_MakeDirTask#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_MakeDirTask/CS/msbuild_MakeDirTask.cs#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
